assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no competing interests.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The Ethics approvals are mentioned in the Methods section: The fibroblast study protocol and consent were approved by the Western Institutional Review Board research protocol (20120789). Ethics approval for work with the fibroblasts was also granted by the Cellule bioethique DGRI-SPFCO-B5 of the French Ministry of Higher Education, Research and Innovation (DC-2019-3665). Mouse experiments were approved by the Boston University Medical Center Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC, PROTO201800107).

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: All authors have read and approved the manuscript and consented for publication.
